title: New player how do I get IP
body: I'm a new player level 14. I've played a few normal games and am now playing bots because I heard it's the fastest way to level up. I'm getting give or take 55 ip for a win and with this I still have 90 games to afford a 6300 champ. Is there a faster way to get ip or is this a sick joke and a waste of my time

replies.body: I suggest for you to not play against bots because you really will not learn much and will hurt you when you try to hop into ranked when you hit level 30. Also, to answer your question about getting ip faster, there really is no way of getting ip faster. But remember to win at least one game a day so you can get your free win of the day ip.
Trust me m8, you have it easy.  Pre lv 30 you get 2x the IP as us lv 30 peeps.
Sorry, my numbers are off, but you do get less of an IP penalty in bot games pre 30.

You get a daily bonus on your first win. The longer the game, the more IP you get. Winning gives more. If you want a cheap champion, I'd suggest Jax. He's only 1350 I think and is a good fighter top, and he can jungle. Same with tryndamere. Also, cho gath is good and cheap.

And don't worry; just because someone costs less doesn't mean they're less powerful. Even those base stats and bars they show aren't very accurate for champion power.
As a new player above level 10 you should be playing mostly PVP games, not only to improve your skill so you're ready for level 30 players, but also because PVP games grant more IP on wins.

How to get IP: Play the game. You will end up with more than you know what to do with.

Short bot games give shitty IP. First win is a 150 IP daily bonus, winning pvp games gives a lot more. 
As a new player, i suggest you avoid 6300-IP champions for a while (most of them are very complicated or dificult to play, anyway)

RP is a trap.

by time you know what ip does you should hve enough for  few expensive champions if you have a need to have a champion every so offten buy one of the cheaper ones and if you dont want to go through the grind champions can also be bought with rp which you can use real money to obtain

When I was low level I just took advantage of Daily Win IP boost other than that you could spend RP on an IP boost. If neither of those things are the answers your looking for then yes, this is a sick twisted joke that has ensnared thousands in its VILE grasp.
